mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_read_book( RB_SEQ, RB_BCODE, RB_DATE, RB_STIME, RB_RTIME, RB_SUBJECT, RB_TEXT, RB_STAR, RB_BNAME )VALUES( READ_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{rb_bcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rb_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rb_stime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rb_rtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rb_subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rb_text,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rb_star,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rb_bname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
